definition[0]: very strong thick string, made by twisting together many thinner strings
example[0]: They tied a rope around my waist and pulled me up.
example[1]: The man was coiling a length of rope.
definition[1]: to tie things together using rope
example[2]: Suitcases were roped to the top of the car.
example[3]: Mountaineers rope themselves together for safety.
definition[2]: to catch an animal using a circle of rope
example[4]: The calves are roped and branded.
